alert.note: Alert for Antelope; Madison; Pierce (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 9:58PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Madison, southwestern Pierce and east central Antelope Counties through 1030 PM CDT... At 958 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 3 miles northwest of Tilden, or 8 miles southeast of Neligh, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Madison, southwestern Pierce and east central Antelope Counties, including the following locations... Willow Creek State Recreation Area. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
